property.label: Display Mode
property.name: mode
property.description: Please select a display mode for your related list. Valid values are 'List' or 'Tile'. 'List' is the default value.

property.label: Number of Records to Display
property.name: numberOfRecords
property.description: Please select how many records you want to display initially. All records are available when you click 'View All'. '5' is the default value.
